author: fradamt
content: I am OOO and without a laptop for two weeks, and unfortunately didn't get around to making a PR about the proposer boost change mentioned on Friday (the bug fix). If there is interest in adding it to the fulu spec, the change is one of the things here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/commit/67e8c96b205c80dfa0028b21aa7c3927d6d82a0e . Namely just add `update_proposer_boost_root` and use it in `on_block`
